text: Joachim Juhl Rothmann (born 29 June 2000) is a Danish professional footballer who plays as a forward for Danish Superliga club FC Nordsjælland. ==Club career== ===FC Nordsjælland=== Rothmann came to FC Nordsjælland at the age of 12 from Greve.FCN FORLÆNGER MED GUDMANN OG ROTHMANN, fcn.dk, 9 January 2019 Rothmann's first senior experience was on 25 November 2018, where he sat on the bench for the whole game against OB in the Danish Superliga. He got his debut for FC Nordsjælland on 5 December 2018. Rothmann started on the bench, but replaced Mads Valentin in the 55th minute in a 0-1 defeat against Vendsyssel FF in the Danish Cup. He got his debut in the Danish Superliga five days later against AGF, where he played 17 minutes in a 1-0 victory. On 9 January 2019, Rothmann signed his first professional contract and would become a permanent part of the first team from the summer of 2019. ==References== ==External links== * * Joachim Rothmann at DBU * Joachim Rothmann at FCN Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Danish footballers Category:Danish Superliga players Category:FC Nordsjælland players Category:Denmark youth international footballers Category:Association football forwards
title: Joachim Rothmann
